name: Pump Pump Boom
description:
Like my other projects, this is a very simple game that can be played with a single button.

Click on the game and then you can use any button on the keyboard or the left mouse button to navigate and play.

Blow up the balloon, try to reach 95% or more, be careful, do not make it explode.

Another game for the list of c1ic.mx "Tiny arcade"

Now you can play all the games directly on http://c1ic.mx/arcade/
